references.paper_title: Deep state space models for time series forecasting
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of deep state space models, introducing the core concept and architecture that the current work builds upon.

references.paper_title: Efficiently modeling long sequences with structured state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the S4 model, a key component in the current work and a significant advancement in efficient long-sequence modeling with SSMs.

references.paper_title: Towards deep learning models resistant to adversarial attacks
